Introduction

Luli Lee (이루리), also known as Lulileela, is a singer-songwriter and producer who works under Knight Airport. She debuted as the bassist and vocalist of the band Bye Bye Badman on January 7, 2011.

Aside from this, she became a member of Seoulmoon in 2016. She also formed two duos: LEEXLEE with Neowa in 2017 and Lower with LENI in 2018. She launched her solo career as Lulileela on January 12, 2018, with her first EP, Rise From The Ashes.
